ColorSensorPixelColors: Well known colors for a NeoPixel strip
NeoPixelMode: Different modes for RGB or RGB+W NeoPixel strips
carBase.createCarBase|param|pinL: the pin of right wheel, eg: pinsofCar.pinNum1
carBase.createCarBase|param|pinR: the pin of right wheel, eg: pinsofCar.pinNum0
neopixel_orange.Strip.clear:
Turn off all LEDs.
You need to call ``show`` to make the changes visible.
neopixel_orange.Strip.easeBrightness: Apply brightness to current colors using a quadratic easing function.
neopixel_orange.Strip.length: Gets the number of pixels declared on the strip
neopixel_orange.Strip.power: Estimates the electrical current (mA) consumed by the current light configuration.
neopixel_orange.Strip.range|param|length: number of LEDs in the range. eg: 4
neopixel_orange.Strip.range|param|start: offset in the LED strip to start the range
neopixel_orange.Strip.rotate:
Rotate LEDs forward.
You need to call ``show`` to make the changes visible.
neopixel_orange.Strip.rotate|param|offse: number of pixels to rotate forward, eg: 1
neopixel_orange.Strip.setBrightness: Set the brightness of the strip. This flag only applies to future operation.
neopixel_orange.Strip.setBrightness|para: a measure of LED brightness in 0-255. eg: 255
neopixel_orange.Strip.setMatrixColor:
Set LED to a given color (range 0-255 for r, g, b) in a matrix shaped strip 
You need to call ``show`` to make the changes visible.
neopixel_orange.Strip.setMatrixWidth: Sets the number of pixels in a matrix shaped strip
neopixel_orange.Strip.setMatrixWidth|par: number of pixels in a row
neopixel_orange.Strip.setPin: Set the pin where the neopixel is connected, defaults to P0.
neopixel_orange.Strip.setPixelColor:
Set LED to a given color (range 0-255 for r, g, b). 
You need to call ``show`` to make the changes visible.
neopixel_orange.Strip.setPixelColor|para: position of the NeoPixel in the strip
neopixel_orange.Strip.setPixelWhiteLED: For NeoPixels with RGB+W LEDs, set the white LED brightness. This only works for RGB+W NeoPixels.
neopixel_orange.Strip.setPixelWhiteLED|p: position of the LED in the strip
neopixel_orange.Strip.shift:
Shift LEDs forward and clear with zeros.
You need to call ``show`` to make the changes visible.
neopixel_orange.Strip.shift|param|offset: number of pixels to shift forward, eg: 1
neopixel_orange.Strip.show: Send all the changes to the strip.
neopixel_orange.Strip.showBarGraph:
Displays a vertical bar graph based on the `value` and `high` value.
If `high` is 0, the chart gets adjusted automatically.
neopixel_orange.Strip.showColor: Shows all LEDs to a given color (range 0-255 for r, g, b).
neopixel_orange.Strip.showRainbow: Shows a rainbow pattern on all LEDs.
neopixel_orange.Strip.showRainbow|param|: the end hue value for the rainbow, eg: 360
the start hue value for the rainbow, eg: 1
neopixel_orange.colors: Gets the RGB value of a known color
neopixel_orange.create: Create a new NeoPixel driver for `numleds` LEDs.
neopixel_orange.create|param|numleds: number of leds in the strip, eg: 24,30,60,64
neopixel_orange.create|param|pin: the pin where the neopixel is connected.
neopixel_orange.hsl: Converts a hue saturation luminosity value into a RGB color
neopixel_orange.rgb: Converts red, green, blue channels into a RGB color
neopixel_orange.rgb|param|blue: value of the blue channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
neopixel_orange.rgb|param|green: value of the green channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
neopixel_orange.rgb|param|red: value of the red channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
output.SoundRecordPlayer.startRecordNoWa:
Check play over

Start record without wait
output.createSoundRecordPlayer|param|pin: singal pin of play, eg: DigitalPin.P0
singal pin of record, eg: DigitalPin.P1
sensor.UltrasonicRangefinder.measureInCe: Ultrasonic Sensor to measure distances in cm
sensor.UltrasonicRangefinder.measureInIn: Ultrasonic Sensor to measure distances in inch
sensor.createUltrasonicRangefinder|param: singal pin of ultrasonic trig, eg: DigitalPin.P0
singal pin of ultrasonic trig, eg: DigitalPin.P1
